name: Event Alerts
description: Monitor Datadog events and generate real-time notifications for specified monitors
author: Datadog Sales Engineering Team

monitorIds.label: Monitor IDs
monitorIds.description: Comma-separated list of Datadog monitor IDs to watch for events

pollingInterval.label: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check for new events

maxEventsHistory.label: Maximum Events History
maxEventsHistory.description: Maximum number of events to keep in history

showEventDetails.label: Show Event Details
showEventDetails.description: Include detailed event information in notifications

autoOpenDashboard.label: Auto-open Dashboard
autoOpenDashboard.description: Automatically open Datadog dashboard when clicking notifications

quietHoursStart.label: Quiet Hours Start
quietHoursStart.description: Start time for quiet hours (24h format)

quietHoursEnd.label: Quiet Hours End
quietHoursEnd.description: End time for quiet hours (24h format)
